name: Magicarpe Online Ultimate
description:
EN

Magicarpe Online Ultimate is a fun arcade whack-a-mole game that takes place in different environments in 2D-pixel style.

Launch the .exe to begin!

Have fun!

FR

Magicarpe Online Ultimate est un jeu fun de type tape-taupes qui arbore plusieurs environnements en 2D avec un style pixel art.

Démarrez le .exe pour commencer !

Appréciez donc !

-------------

Thanks to Guillaume Destacamp and Quentin Lordel for their participation for the design of several maps.
